sentence.Network_en: Ron Artest beat up the guy who beat up Kimbo Slice in 13 seconds.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿泰秒杀了那个13秒钟内搞定街斗之王KIMBOSLICE的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 广州市黄埔区海博瑞清洁除尘机电商行 ... 海威 hiwin 劲霸 kimbo 洁霸 jieba.

auth_sentence.content: In fact, he's embarrassed by how uninterested he is in Kimbo.
